How We Get You Recommended by AI

Setup: 3-4 weeks. First results: 30-60 days. Best results: 6+ months as network effects compound.

Step 1: Free 30-Minute Audit

See where you stand before committing.

Live AI Testing

Watch as we test your business across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Grok in real-time. See if you appear, how you're described, and where you rank vs competitors.

Competitor Analysis

We identify which businesses in your region win AI recommendations and show what they're doing differently.

Network Opportunity Mapping

We identify 3-5 potential partner businesses perfect for referral relationships and show you who to approach.

Honest Positioning Workshop Preview

We help define what you actually are—not aspirational fluff. Example: "Large operation perfect for tour buses" vs claiming "intimate boutique."

Custom Roadmap

See exactly how we'd implement both parts (Network Effects + AI-Optimised Content) for your specific business.

Realistic Projection

Expected improvements based on similar businesses. We give honest projections, not guarantees.

No obligation. The audit alone gives valuable insights.

Schedule your free audit →

Step 2: Setup (Week 1-4)

Week 1-2: Network Effects Setup

Network Partnership clients: We contact chosen partners, invite them to join, coordinate kickoff meeting, create partnership agreements, and set up referral tracking.

Individual clients: We identify ideal partners and provide outreach templates with successful partnership examples.

All clients: We plan cross-linking strategy and identify natural collaboration opportunities.

Week 2-3: AI-Optimised Content Creation

Honest positioning workshop: 90-minute session to define what you actually are—target audience clarity, differentiation, and review analysis.

Create your /ai directory: 10-15 Q&As in conversational format matching how travellers ask questions.

Example Q&A format:

Q: Best large-group wineries Barossa with tour bus access?
A: We're a commercial operation perfect for groups of 20-50. 
Coach parking onsite, wheelchair accessible, group menus $45pp...

Build llms.txt: Roadmap file pointing AI systems to your /ai content and listing network partners.

Basic setup: Configure robots.txt to allow AI crawlers, update sitemap, add internal links.

Week 3-4: Testing & Launch

  • Test across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Grok with 10 query variations
  • Confirm AI crawlers access your llms.txt and /ai files
  • Verify partner cross-references are indexed
  • Document baseline: mention frequency, recommendation quality, competitive position

Step 3: Ongoing Optimisation (Monthly)

Weekly AI Monitoring

We track 100+ queries monthly. Test 20 core variations every Monday. Document changes and trending patterns.

Monthly Content Updates

  • Add 2-3 new Q&As targeting trending queries we identified
  • Seasonal adjustments: Harvest seasons, holiday periods, weather changes
  • New offerings: Tours, menu items, room types, experiences
  • Pricing updates: Keep package prices current

Network Coordination (Network Partnership Only)

  • Monthly calls: 45-minute Zoom aligning promotions
  • Quarterly strategy: Full network meeting for seasonal campaigns
  • Referral tracking: Show each partner booking attribution

Monthly Performance Report

  • AI mention frequency (% of relevant queries)
  • Platform breakdown (which AI systems mention you most)
  • Trending queries (new question types)
  • Competitive position vs top competitors
  • Content performance (which Q&As trigger mentions)
  • Network referrals (if applicable)

Expected Timeline

Weeks 1-4: Setup Phase

Files deployed, network partnerships established. AI hasn't indexed yet—baseline measurement phase.

Weeks 5-8: Initial Indexing

Crawlers accessing your content but not yet prioritising in recommendations. Early signs of improvement (0-5% uplift).

Weeks 9-16: Acceleration

Consistent mentions increasing. Network validation signals working. Noticeable improvement: 15-25% uplift in relevant queries.

Week 17+: Compounding Returns

Stable mention rate. Network effects strengthen signals. 40-70% uplift typical for quality businesses.

Reality Check

Results depend on:

  • Business quality (3.5+ star reviews minimum)
  • Content consistency (monthly updates required)
  • Network strength (Partnership plan sees faster results)
  • Query competition (niche positioning helps)
  • Seasonal factors (tourism has natural cycles)

What You Need to Provide

Initial Setup (2-3 hours total)

  • Business details (capacity, pricing, policies)
  • Website access (FTP or CMS login)
  • Honest description of services and current pricing
  • For positioning workshop: Willingness to be transparent, examples of happy/unhappy customers, what makes you different
  • For networks: Potential partners, existing relationships, collaboration ideas

Ongoing (30 minutes monthly)

  • Monthly check-in call for updates on new offerings, pricing changes, seasonal availability
  • Network clients: Additional 45 minutes for coordination calls

We handle everything else.

When You Shouldn't Hire Us

  • Poor reviews (below 3.5 stars): Fix service first
  • Inconsistent availability: AI recommends reliable businesses
  • Not ready for honesty: We'll clash if you resist accurate positioning
  • Want guarantees: We can't promise specific rankings
  • Need instant results: This takes 6+ months minimum

Better to know upfront.
